channel.title: Enquête sur les pratiques relatives aux données ouvertes en recherche. 2020
channel.description: Recent content on Enquête sur les pratiques relatives aux données ouvertes en recherche. 2020

item.title: Pushing transparency beyond the norm
item.description: Many of the discussions that I have about transparency in research focus on the scrutiny of research methods and products.

item.title: Surveying Open Data Practices Kicks Off
item.description: Introducing a new IDRC project to survey data sharing practices among researchers in Africa.
